text: The Football Association of Indonesia (; ; abbreviated as PSSI) is the governing body of football in Indonesia. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded on 19 April 1930. It became a member of FIFA in 1952 and AFC in 1954. title: Football Association of Indonesia
